name: Master of the Seven Teas
description:
Epic maritime skirmishes on a teeny, tiny, teacup scale!

Take control of your miniature pirate ship, fire your cannons and sink your enemies to become the Master of the Seven Teas.

Featuring

  • 7 different levels, each with a unique hazard
  • Multiple enemy types with different stats
  • A plethora of weapons and power-ups, including Shark, Octopi and Ninja
  • A full Single Player campaign
  • Local and Network Multiplayer across 3 modes
  • Accurately simulated Tea surface
